recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Coffee Cake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Delicious cinnamon and caramel coffee cake! FW Caramel Cinnamon Roll is the main cinnamon note with cap cinnamon sugar backing it up and ooo cornbread providing additional rich sweet cakey body. The corn note in OOO Cornbread isn't very strong so it gets covered up easily and just leaves a sweet, dense cake behind.. Flv Caramel provides the brown sugar note needed here.

reviews.text: fantastic recipe!!  Thanks for sharing.  Just enuff coffee flavor in there to sell it!  Great balance with the bakery notes and of course the FLV "Brown sugar" and caramel cinn roll!!  Wifes fav morning vape and she's picky!!!
